ej,rojac101,C,cousd901,Call at 3B $Blue Jays coach Rojas ejected by 1B umpire Cousins after Blue Jays manager Martinez argued that Sanchez had been doubled off 2nd; Rojas came out of dugout and waved arms to get attention of Martinez to appeal that Varitek had left 3rd too soon; umpire Cousins thought Rojas was arguing same call as Martinez and ejected him

ej,mattg002,P,marsr901,Inciting bench-clearing brawl ej,robew001,P,marsr901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,clont101,C,marsr901,Bench-clearing brawl $Orioles Matthews and Willis Roberts and Boston coach Cloninger ejected by HP umpire Marsh; Matthews took a few steps towards the mound after being hit and both teams were warned about not throwing at hitters; Matthews pitcher Lowe yelled at each other after Matthews went to 1B; Matthews headed to the mound after Batista fouled off a pitch, causing a bench-clearing brawl; Roberts punched Red Sox Baerga in short CF; Roberts' jersey was torn off; Orioles Fordyce and Cloninger pushed each other near HP
